00021 class Item;

00030 class RegionFamilies {
00031 public:
00032    enum families {
00034       adminRegions  = 0,
00036       postalRegions = 1,
00038       categories    = 2,
00040       endFamily     = 3
00041    };
00042 
00046    static const int nbrFamilies = endFamily;
00047 
00048    
00055    static bool itemBelongsToFamily( int familyNumber,
00056                                     const Item* item );
00057 
00063    inline static bool searchTypeBelongsToFamily( int familyNumber,
00064                                                  uint32 searchType );
00065  
00066 protected:
00067    
00073    inline static uint32 getSearchTypesForFamily( int familyNumber );
00074 
00079    class familyToSearchTypeMap_t : public map<int, uint32> {
00080      public:
00082       familyToSearchTypeMap_t();
00083    };
00084       
00086    static const familyToSearchTypeMap_t c_familySearchtypes;
00087    
00088 };
00089 
00090 uint32
00091 RegionFamilies::getSearchTypesForFamily( int familyNumber )
00092 {
00093    familyToSearchTypeMap_t::const_iterator it =
00094       c_familySearchtypes.find( familyNumber );
00095    if ( it != c_familySearchtypes.end() ) {
00096       return it->second;
00097    } else {
00098       // No types.
00099       return 0;
00100    }
00101 }
00102 
00103 bool
00104 RegionFamilies::searchTypeBelongsToFamily( int familyNumber,
00105                                            uint32 searchType )
00106 {
00107    return getSearchTypesForFamily( familyNumber ) & searchType;
00108 }
